mapper.insert: create or replace view search_view as select hotel.id, hotel.name, hotel.rating, price.price, img.filepath, img.filename, location.sido, reservation.check_in, reservation.check_out, room.limit_people, room.id as room_id, hotel_description.swimming_pool, hotel_description.parking, hotel_description.smoking, hotel_description.restaurant, hotel_description.laundry_facilities, hotel_description.fitness_center from hotel left join hotel_description on hotel.id= hotel_description.hotel_id left join location on hotel.id= location.hotel_id left join room on hotel.id= room.hotel_id left join room_description on room.id= room_description.room_id left join reservation on reservation.room_id= room.id left join price on room.id= price.room_id left join img on hotel.id= img.hotel_id ;
mapper.select: select id, name, rating, price, room_id, swimming_pool, parking, smoking, restaurant, laundry_facilities, fitness_center from search_view where sido like #{sido} and limit_people>=2 and room_id not in( select room_id from search_view where #{checkinDate} < check_out or ( #{checkinDate} < check_in and #{checkoutDate} > check_out ) or #{checkoutDate} > check_out or (#{checkinDate} > check_in and #{checkoutDate} < check_out) group by room_id );
